### Installation Instructions
```bash

# Install globally for CLI usage

# Yarn
yarn add {{PACKAGE_NAME}}@{{NEW_VERSION}}

# pnpm
pnpm add {{PACKAGE_NAME}}@{{NEW_VERSION}}
```
